privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We are committed to safeguarding your privacy. This policy outlines how we collect, utilize, and protect your personal information with the utmost care.
privacy.item1: Your name and email address (provided during signup)
privacy.item2: Usage data, including views, likes, and ratings
privacy.item3: To enhance your user experience on our platform
privacy.item4: To deliver service-related notifications and updates
